nodes.bodyText:
@lasinicl I don't think above error message is correct . It is not an indexing based access.
Shall we update it as "cannot update ''{0}'' with member access expression"?  WDYT?

 error.invalid.key.constraint.provided.for.access = \

+error.cannot.update.table.using.member.access.lvexpr = \
+  cannot update ''{0}'' using indexing
